src: On 7 March 2022, the Court of Final Appeal of the Macau S.A.R. Region ruled on an appeal against an application for registration of the trademark "Lai Kei". In the judgment, it was pointed out that the trademark of Lai Kei Ice Cream was composed of images of Lai Kei and a little girl, and that it was a trademark with this reputation, and therefore affirmed the decision to reject the registration of the "similar" trademark. It was also pointed out that the shop holding the trademark "Lai Kei and the image of a little girl" (i.e. "Lai Kei Ice Cream") was assessed by the "Macao Distinctive Old Shop Assessment Committee" as a "Macao Characteristic Old Shop", which "is a long-established shop and distinctive trademark in Macao, and a reputable trademark will increase the risk of confusion among consumers about similar trademarks, as this well-known trademark will leave a lasting memory for consumers".
tgt: 2022年3月7號，澳門特別行政區終審法院系對一宗關於商標——「禮記Lai Kei」註冊申請上訴案作出咗裁決。系判決書到指出禮記雪糕嘅商標系由禮記Lai Kei同埋一名細路女嘅圖像組成」，並且系享有呢個聲譽嘅商標，故此確認拒絕「相似」商標註冊嘅決定。又指，持有「禮記Lai Kei同埋一名細路女嘅圖像組成」呢個商標嘅店鋪（即：「禮記雪糕」）被「澳門特色老店評定委員會」評定咗系「澳門特色老店」，「屬澳門歷史悠久嘅店鋪同埋具有特色嘅商標，而享有聲譽嘅商標會增加消費者對相似嘅商標產生咗混淆嘅風險，因為呢個馳名商標會為消費者留低左更持久嘅記憶」。

src: "ござる", "为さる(なさる)", "下さる(くださる)", "いる(くださる)", "いよ(くださる)", "いる(くっしゃる)", "おっしゃる", "おっしゃる", "いい", which is different from the usual five-paragraph active verbs. In addition, all four words except "ござる" have been changed to "~い". Therefore, these five words are sometimes referred to as the ラ行 of modern Chinese, and the verbs are particularly used. Although "御座る (ござる)" comes from "ござ" + "あり", and "おっしゃnaughty" comes from "仰せ" + "あり", in contrast to the characteristics of the use of the ancient text ラ行変格 in which the termination of the form is the same as the form of the same form, the special feature of the use of the ラ行 is that the form of the command is the same form. This indicates that these words are not used in ancient texts.
tgt: 「ござる」「為さる（なさる）」「下さる（くださる）」「いらっしゃる」「おっしゃる」呢五個詞後邊跟住「ます」嘅時候，連用形變成「～い」呢一點同通常五段活用動詞唔同。此外、除「ござる」以外嘅四個詞命令形全數變做「～い」。因此呢五個詞有時被稱為現代文嘅ラ行特別活用動詞。雖然「御座る（ござる）」嚟自「ござ」＋「あり」，「おっしゃる」嚟自「仰せ」＋「あり」，但係相對於古文嘅ラ行変格活用當中終止形同連用形同形嘅特徵，ラ行特別活用嘅特徴係連用形同命令形同形。呢一點表明呢啲詞並非古文嘅ラ行変格活用。

In February 1972, founder and director Allan Cheng led to the establishment of the Vancouver Chinese Library Service Association with the help of a government-funded rehabilitation grant for the Balsta Conna community. The purpose of this community improvement grant is to beautify and maintain the community environment, and at the same time, it became the initial concept of the construction of the Chinese library.

In the 21st century, with the opening of Hong Kong to free travel, there are still many Hong Kong-funded enterprises back to Guangzhou to open a branch (such as Xu Liushan umbrella Hui Lau Shan uranium), Guangzhou people have deepened their understanding of Hong Kong's retention of Cantonese spelling, and the Hong Kong government's preservation and inheritance of Cantonese culture has inspired Hui Guangzhou people to be dissatisfied with the mainland government's forced popularization and stifling local culture. However, some people in Guangzhou, after not knowing some of the history of Cantonese pinyin, think that some pinyin was invented in Hong Kong, so they call it Lin Hong Kong Pinyin uranium. In 2010, the Hong Kong government's Hing Shing Road was used for many media interviews, and many citizens supported it at that time. src: History, abbreviated as historiography, is the study of all issues in human society. Historiography is not creed, doctrine, literature. The aim of historical science is to get as close as possible to the real situation. In the Western Zhou Dynasty, there was a record of history, and the history was recorded in the Western Zhou Dynasty, and the history of ancient China was divided into royal and folk, and the Western Zhou Dynasty Jinwen was a model of royal historiography, and the Spring and Autumn Period and the Historical Records were the representative works of folk historiography, and history was an important part of ancient Chinese royal education. The ancestors of European historiography were Thucydides, Herodotus, and the historiography of the Catholic Church. Europe, after the Age of Enlightenment, emphasized rational thinking, such as in the time of Voltaire-Louis XIV. Prussian Ranke wrote history from linguistic, folklore surveys and the use of government archives, and Ranke read extensively the official archives of Prussia and Italy and the national language of Serbia, all of which were valued at the time. The research content and research topics of twentieth-century history have been expanded to include socio-economic issues, such as the Annals School, Public History, and Oral History.
tgt: 歷史學，簡稱史學，係研究人類社會一切問題在內嘅科學。歷史學唔係信條、教義、文學。歷史科學嘅目的就係盡可能噉接近真實情況。西周就有作冊、史某嘅講法，史喺西周就係記錄人員，喺中國古代記錄歷史有皇家同民間之分，西周金文係皇家史學嘅典範，春秋、史記就係民間史學嘅代表作，歷史學係中國古代皇家教育嘅重要內容。歐洲嘅歷史學始祖係修昔底德、希羅多德、天主教會史學。歐洲喺啟蒙時代之後，強調理性思考，例如伏爾泰路易十四時代。普魯士蘭克就從語言、民俗調查同使用政府檔案書寫歷史，蘭克就廣泛閱讀普魯士、意大利嘅官方檔案和塞爾維亞民族語言，呢啲資料都係當時所重視。二十世紀歷史學嘅研究內容同研究主題擴展為社會經濟問題，如年鑑學派、公共史學、口述歷史。

Actor character introduction, number of episodes, Kong Liu Jinxin, 939 years old, ghost. Clad in blood, he is a veritable god of war, but he died under the sword of the monarch he guarded, just to keep his promise to the previous king. During this 939 years, he lived as a ghost, like a sword in his heart, and the vicious and romantic curse "You can only pull this sword out if you meet a ghost bride". One day when he continues this immortal life, he meets Chi Ting, a 19-year-old girl who claims to be the ghost bride. In other words, listening to scolding is the only weapon that can kill oneself. In the whole play, Lee Dong Wook Wang Li is in his 300s, a messenger of the underworld, and he was the king of Goryeo to whom Kim Shin was loyal during his lifetime. The death of every man is a covenant with him. He lives with the ghost Kim Shin, and often feels the limits of his heart in Kim Shin's changeable emotions and impermanence. As soon as he opened his eyes after his death, he had already become a messenger of the underworld, and he had forgotten all about the past, and all he knew was countless dead souls. But one day, he meets a woman, Sunny, and feels dizzy and in a mood that he hasn't seen for a long time. After completing the mission of the messenger of the underworld, he was reincarnated as Li He, a criminal policeman of the Serious Crime Team of the Gangnam Police Department, and fell in love with the reincarnated Kim Sun again. Kim Min-jae (special starring) A young monarch in the Goryeo era, after the collapse of his father and the death of his humble mother, he was single-handedly pulled by Park Huanheon, the superintendent of the country, and listened to his slanderous rumors to make him jealous of the military general Kim Shin, who was regarded as a god by the people, and worried about his high merits, and gave Kim Shin to death for the felony of treason. Yu Hou survived in the longing for Kim Sun, and deliberately drank the poisonous decoction presented by Park Joong Heon in order to find relief. 1, 7-13 Kim Go-eun (Childhood: Han Shuzhen (Korean: Naughty (2008) ) Chi Ting's scolding is 19 years old, an ordinary senior high school candidate. Before he was born, he and his mother died in a car accident, but he was rescued by Jin Shin and resurrected, and since then he has been recognized as "other missing ones" by the messengers of the underworld. Since childhood, I can see the souls of the dead that ordinary people can't see, so I go alone. In a hodgepodge of speechless life, she meets a ghost, and her fate is to become the bride of the ghost. Ghosts always appear after the candles are blown out, and curiosity gradually becomes a habit, and waiting for ghosts is like waiting for a better future. After being killed in a car accident, she was reincarnated as a high school girl Park So-min with her memories and returned to Canada to reunite with Kim Shin. The whole drama Yoo In-na Sunny (Kim Sun) is 28 years old, an orphan, the owner of a fried chicken restaurant, and in her previous life, Kim Shin's sister and Queen Kim Sun of Goryeo. Early on I realized that the most comfortable thing in the world is an ignorant woman, a man's appearance is the window of the soul, and true love is felt through a passbook, for Sunny, who is about to be 30 years old, becoming someone's first love is the easiest thing in the world. When she first saw the messenger of the underworld when she found the ring she wanted to have, she at first thought he was a good-looking fool, and even if sympathy was not her specialty, the sad look in his eyes was always heart-wrenching. After 68 years of life, she was reincarnated as an actress and fell in love with the reincarnated Wang Li again. 2-16 Kim So-hyun (special starring) The queen of the Goryeo era and the younger sister of Kim Shin, who did not want to see his brother die after Wang Li was subject to Park Joong-heon because of himself, and chose to die under the king's arrows. 1, 7-12 Lu Xingcai (Childhood: Jung Ji-hoon (Korean: Naughty (2007년) ) (Youth: Kim Hyun-bin (Korean: Naughty)) Andy Lau is 25 years old, the third chaebol, the thirteenth-generation only son of the family that serves ghosts. The Yoo family's gradual growth from a gold and silver shop on the outskirts of Hanyang to a large business is also due to the ghosts, and the next generation will be served by Teokhua. At first, he chose to resist, and after realizing for the first time the fact that the ghosts had been separated again and again, and no matter how painful it was, he could only stagnation alone in the world, and from that day on, Dehua made up his mind: from now on, the assistant will start now. Because of his kind and simple nature, he was chosen by the Seven Star God and attached to him, and his consciousness will be replaced when necessary, and he is the driving force behind all events in secret. The whole play
tgt: 演員 角色 介紹 登場集數 孔劉 金信 939歲，鬼怪。身披血光、手撕敵軍嘅佢係名副其實嘅戰神，但係佢死喺自己守護嘅君主刀下，就係為咗堅守對先王嘅承諾。喺呢939年間都係用鬼怪身份活著，就好似佢心上插嘅一把劍一樣，狠毒又浪漫嘅詛咒「只有遇到鬼怪新娘先可以將呢把劍拔出嚟」。喺佢繼續緊呢種不滅生命嘅某一日，遇到自稱鬼怪新娘嘅19歲女仔池聽晫。即係話，聽晫就是可以殺死自己嘅唯一武器。全劇 李棟旭 王黎 300幾歲，陰間使者，生前係金信效忠嘅高麗國國王。每一個人嘅死亡，就係同佢嘅約定。佢同鬼怪金信一齊住，成日會喺金信多變嘅情緒同無常中感受到內心嘅極限。佢喺死後一睜開眼就已經成為咗陰間使者，以前嘅事已經全部唔記得，佢知道嘅只係無數嘅亡魂。但有一天，他遇見一個女人Sunny，感到眩暈同久違咗嘅心情。完成陰間使者嘅使命之後，佢轉世成為江南警察廳重案組刑警李赫，同轉世嘅金善再一次相愛。金旻載 （特別出演） 高麗時代的年少君主，在父王崩殂及身分卑微的母親去世後，由國子監樸仲憲一手拉拔，聽信其讒言使其對被百姓視為神崇敬的武將金信心生嫉妒，憂其功高震主，將金信以叛國重罪賜死。餘後在對金善的思念中苟存，故意喝下樸仲憲呈上的有毒湯藥以求解脫。1、7-13 金高恩 （童年：韓書真（韓文：한서진 (2008년)）） 池聽晫 19歲，平凡的高三考生。出生前本與母親因車禍死亡，後被金信所救而復活，從此被陰間使者認定為「其他遺漏者」。從小能看見普通人無法看到的亡魂，因此獨來獨往。大雜燴般無語人生中，她遇見了鬼怪，命運是成為鬼怪的新娘。鬼怪總在吹滅燭火後出現，好奇心漸漸成為習慣，等待鬼怪時就像等待著美好未來般心動。車禍身亡後帶著記憶轉世成高中少女樸昭敏，回到加拿大與金信重逢。全劇 劉寅娜 Sunny（金善） 28歲，孑然一身的孤兒，炸雞店老闆，前世為金信的妹妹、高麗王后金善。早早就領悟到世上最舒服的就是不懂事的女人，男人的外貌是心靈之窗，真正的愛情是通過存摺感受到的，對於即將30歲的Sunny而言，成為某個人的初戀是世上最簡單的事。在她發現了想擁有的戒指時初次見到陰間使者，起初只認為他是個好看的傻瓜，即使同情並非自己的特長，但從他悲傷的眼神總讓人揪心。結束68年的人生後轉世成一位女演員，與轉世的王黎再次相愛。2-16 金所炫 （特別出演） 高麗時代的王后、金信的妹妹，不願看見兄長死後王黎因為自己而受制於樸仲憲，選擇死於君王的箭下。1、7-12 陸星材 （童年：鄭智薰（韓文：정지훈 (2007년)）） （少年：金賢斌（韓文：김현빈）） 劉德華 25歲，財閥三世，侍奉鬼怪的家族第十三代獨子。劉氏家族從漢陽郊外的金銀店起家一步步成長為大企業，也都是鬼怪的功勞，而下一代要由德華來侍奉。一開始他選擇了反抗，在第一次領悟到鬼怪經歷的一次又一次離別，再怎麼痛苦也只能獨自停滯在世上這個事實後，從那天起德華下定了決心：輔佐就從現在開始吧。因善良單純的本性，被七星神選中並附在他身上，必要時刻意識會被取代，是暗中牽引所有事件的推手。全劇

The detector can only detect the approximate position of the alien without taking the exact position, and the alien will not detect if it is stationary. The game is designed with a crafting system that allows players to defend themselves by crafting weapons and tools. The objects needed to craft are randomly distributed across the map rather than in fixed locations, and players will have to explore the entire level to find what they need each time they play. In the game, players will have the opportunity to hack into various computers and electronic devices to obtain information or trigger mechanisms.

src: The pieces are placed in the unstarted area of the corresponding color. Everyone takes turns rolling the dice once. Roll to 6 to place a piece at the starting position. The player can move any of the moves that have already started according to the number of points thrown. If you roll 6, you can choose a non-starting piece to be placed at the starting position instead of moving the starting piece. If you roll a 6, you can roll the dice one more time. If the third roll reaches a 6, that action is void and it is the next player's turn. Any piece can be passed through on the way. If you hit another player's piece, you can kick the enemy's piece back into the area where there is no starting point, and you can roll the dice again. To reach the finish line, you must roll just the right number of points to succeed. Every time a move reaches the end, you can roll the dice again. The first to reach the end of all his pieces is the winner.
tgt: 棋子先放喺對應顏色嘅未出發區域。每個人輪流擲骰一次。擲到6先可以將一隻棋放喺起點位置。玩家可以根據擲到嘅點數，移動任意一隻已經出發咗棋子相應嘅步數。若果擲到6，可以唔移動出發咗嘅棋子，而選擇一隻未出發嘅棋子放喺起點位置。若果擲到6，可以額外再擲一次骰。若果第三次擲到6，果一次行動無效，輪到下一位玩家。途中可以穿過任何棋子。如果撞到其他玩家嘅棋子，可以將敵人嘅棋子踢返去未出發區域，並且可以再擲一次骰。到達終點一定擲到啱啱好嘅點數先至成功。每次有棋到達終點，都可以再擲一次骰。最先將自己的所有棋子到達終點嘅就係贏家。

CD Journal described the arrangement of this version of "Tears Are Not Decorations" as "jazzy" and praised him as "too much if the audience would not like it, so [the arrangement] has reached a very dangerous point, but (Inoue) must have understood this in his heart." Tang Ren New Village is not an indigenous village, with a small population in its early years, and it was only developed in the 1950s. In 1952, Fr. Lee Hope and Pastor Poon Tzu-wai came from Yuen Long City to Ping Shan to open up a church ministry in Ping Hong Lane, Tang Yan New Village, Ping Shan, which is the Assemblies of God in the New Territories Ping Shan Church. The following year, the church rented Jing Yuen Farm, the predecessor of the Wai Kwan School (which was closed in 2006). In 1970, Cam Ranh Kwan moved from Fook Lao Village Road, Kowloon City to the current location of Tong Yan New Village, where the Administrator of the Richer Government of Yuen Long, New Territories, Mr Tang Lok, officiated at the ribbon-cutting ceremony. Since the 1990s, Tangren New Village has been developed into a low-density residential area, and detached houses are clustered in the area of Shajing Road and Tangren Xincun Road in Tangren New Village. Between 1991 and 1993, Hop Hing Cooking Oil also moved its production plant from Castle Peak Road, Lai Chi Kok, where it was not well utilized.
tgt: 唐人新村唔係原住村落，早年人口唔多，喺1950年代先俾人開發。1952年，李希望教士同埋潘慈惠教士從元朗市來到屏山開荒，喺屏山唐人新村近屏康裏開辦教會事工，即係新界神召會屏山堂。翌年，教會租到靜園農場，即係惠羣學校（喺2006年停辦）前身。1970年，金蘭觀從九龍城福佬村道遷至唐人新村現址，嗰時新界元朗理民府理民官鄧樂等擔任主禮剪綵嘉賓，到賀嘉賓極眾，港九新界哄動，報章亦大加報導。1990年代開始，唐人新村被開發為低密度住宅區，獨立洋房聚集在唐人新村沙井路、唐人新村路一帶。而合興食油也喺1991到1993年間把生產廠房由應用不敷嘅荔枝角青山道搬去嗰度。

src: In 1988, he set up an environmental consultancy to provide professional advice on environmental matters to the government, schools and private organisations such as architects and developers. In 2001, when Beijing applied to host the 2008 Olympic Games, Liao Xiudong invited environmental experts and representatives to the Olympic Bidding Committee, who was responsible for explaining the environmental protection status with Beijing's bid for the Olympic Games. He was also the General Manager of Citule Group China, where he was responsible for environmental and infrastructure projects. In July 2002, the then Chief Executive Tung Chee-hwa implemented the accountability system for senior officials and hired Liao Xiudong as the Secretary for the Environment, Transport and Works.

Qinglong (English: , 1948), Hong Kong hepatatologist. He attended Diocesan Boys' School as a child and graduated with a Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery from the Faculty of Medicine of the University of Hong Kong in 1970. Since 1971, he has been working in the Department of Internal Medicine of the University of Hong Kong. Since 1987, he has been researching the treatment of hepatitis B. In 2003, he was appointed Professor of Medicine and Hepatology at the Faculty of Medicine at the University of Hong Kong. In 2011, he was appointed Li Kwok-yin Foundation Professorship and Chair Professor of Medicine and Hepatology. After retiring in 2014, he continued to work at hospitals and universities.

src: At the end of September 2017, it was reported in the media that Leung's Facebook account had received a warning that the content of a post violated Facebook's terms of use, and that the warning message also stated that the account would be suspended if it was repeated in the future. Afterwards, Liang posted a post on the fan page, saying that the name "Blue Orange" might disappear from the platform, and the post immediately caused enthusiastic replies from netizens. Netizens' replies show that they appreciate Liang's work and hope that he will not be affected by the relevant incidents, that he can continue to create, and that he will notify his supporters even if he eventually has to move to other platforms, but at the same time, they also mentioned that they can prevent similar incidents from happening in the future by modifying sensitive words.

The Bank of East Asia Limited (BEA) (HKEX: 0023) (OTCBB: BKEAY) is a financial company listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange, providing banking and related financial services, as well as business, corporate and investor services. The company was established in 1918 and registered in Hong Kong, and the current chairman and chief executive officer is Li Guobao. As at 31 December 2017, BEA's total consolidated assets were HK$808.9 billion, total deposits were HK$571.7 billion, total shareholders' equity was HK$101.2 billion and net profit was HK$10.515 billion.

src: Tobler first proposed this groundbreaking idea at a meeting of the Committee on Qualitative Methods of the International Geographical Union in 1969 and later published it in 1970. It's easy to say, but the idea is profound. Without such a thing, "in principle, conditions anywhere on the surface of the earth could occur in any small area. An area that describes the near-homogeneity of a polygon object by assigning attributes to it will not exist. The surface of the terrain is littered with craters, with infinite slopes everywhere, and some of the contours of the surface are infinitely dense and distorted. Spatial analysis, or even life itself, is impossible. 」
tgt: 託布勒係1969年舉行嘅國際地理聯合會定性方法委員會會議上首次提出咗呢個開創性嘅諗法，後尾佢喺1970年將呢個諗法發表出嚟。雖然講出嚟好簡單，但是呢個諗法嘅意義深遠。如果無呢樣嘢，「原則上地球表面任何地方嘅各種狀況都能喺任何小區域裏便出現。通過賦予屬性畀面狀對象嚟描述佢的近似均質嘅區域將唔會存在。地形表面會亂曬坑咁，度度都係無窮大嘅坡度，並且啲表面嘅輪廓會無限密集兼且扭曲。空間分析，甚至乎生活本身，都係冇可能嘅。」

Rua de Sacadura Cabral (Portugal: Rua de Sacadura Cabral), commonly known as Rua de Sacadura Cabral, is a street on the Macau Peninsula named after the Portugal pilot Sacadura Cabral. The total length of the street is about 440 meters, and the width is about 9 meters. The southeast side starts at the west side of Avenida Chobais, the grocery store in the parish of Wangde Parish, and intersects with Netherlands Main Street, Tap Seac Street, Hope Street, and General Rodley Street along the way, enters St. Anthony's Parish at Jabriel Admiral Street, and then intersects with Jolok Lane, Baila Street and Arry Crow Street, and goes northwest to Liansheng Road to connect to Moshan Street. The street, which runs from Netherlands Garden Street to Hope Street, used to be called Calçada do Tap Siac.
tgt: 沙嘉都喇賈罷麗街（葡萄牙文：Rua de Sacadura Cabral），通稱沙嘉都喇街，係澳門半島一條街，以葡萄牙飛行員撒卡度拿卡伯拉爾命名。街道全長約440米，闊大約9米。東南邊喺望德堂區嘅士多鳥拜斯大馬路、塔石廣場嘅西邊開始，沿途同荷蘭園正街、塔石街、厚望街、羅德禮將軍街交匯，喺賈伯樂提督街進入聖安多尼堂區，再同僑樂巷、俾利喇街及亞利鴉架街交匯，西北邊去到連勝馬路為止，連接墨山街。呢條街由荷蘭園正街至厚望街嗰橛，舊時嗌塔石斜巷（Calçada do Tap Siac）。

Lin Beast, also known as tool man, means a person who is willing to do things for the other party for free in order to please "one's" favorite object, and there are similar names such as Lin Beast, spare tire, licking dog, volcano filial son, knights, etc. in various parts of the Chinese-speaking region. Originally, it referred to an animal that was trained to carry objects on its back or ride on a human (see Animal Transport). In the culture of the Internet in Chinese mainland, licking a dog means a person who shushes the object of affection in response to warmth, that is, kneels and licks others like a dog. In Hong Kong, these men are also called spare tires (like the attendants under the Guanyin throne are sent by Xiao Xian). The word "spare tire" has a long history, and is used in Hong Kong slang to describe the desperate fact that some man does anything for a woman in order to pursue her. Later, the term was extended to virtual communities such as Internet forums. The women who are worshipped are called Guanyin, Niangniang or Goddess, which is derived from the word "spare tire". In Taiwan's online culture, the recipient of the offering is usually called a princess or goddess than others, and the devotee is often referred to as a volcano filial son or knight.
tgt: 馱獸，又稱工具人，意思係指為左討好「自己嘅」心儀對象而甘心為對方無償做事嘅人，喺華語地區各地有馱獸、觀音兵、舔狗、火山孝子、騎士團等類似嘅稱呼。馱獸原本係指指訓練用黎背負物品或者比人騎乘嘅動物（見動物運輸）。在中國大陸網絡嘅文化，舔狗意思係對愛慕對象噓寒問暖以求回應嘅人，即係好似隻狗咁跪舔他人  。而喺香港呢啲男人又稱為觀音兵（好似觀音座下嘅侍從小仙咁樣任由差遣）  。「觀音兵」呢個字詞歷史久遠，喺香港俚語中用黎形容某些男性為了追求女性，而不顧一切為該女性做各種事情 。後來此詞引申至互聯網論壇等虛擬社羣。被人崇拜的女性稱作觀音、娘娘或女神，即源於「觀音兵」一詞 。喺臺灣的網路文化中，接受奉獻嘅對象通常會比人稱為公主、女神，而奉獻者常被比人稱呼為火山孝子或騎士團。

src: The wind and rain are blowing, the sun is raining.

The first crash occurred at 10:50 a.m. on 27 February 2018, when Unicom's network operation center found that a large number of customers were unable to use mobile voice service, SMS service and mobile data service. It was not until 1 p.m. that the network operation center began emergency repairs, and services were resumed at 2:20 p.m. At 4:30 p.m., all services returned to normal. The entire outage lasted 5 hours and 40 minutes, affecting a total of 138,150 customers, accounting for 15.78% of Unicom's Hong Kong customers. The second crash occurred at 11:15 a.m. on 31 March, similar to that of a month ago. It was not until 6:45 p.m. that all services were restored to normal, and the entire failure lasted 7 hours and 25 minutes, also affecting 138,150 customers. The two failures lasted a total of 13 hours and 15 minutes.
tgt: 聯通香港首宗「死機」意外喺2018年2月27日上晝10時50分發生，聯通嘅網絡操作中心發現咗大批客戶未能夠使用流動話音服務、短訊服務及流動數據服務。到下午1時，網絡操作中心先至開始搶修，下晝2時20分陸續恢復服務。下晝4時30分，所有服務回復正常。整個故障歷時5小時40分鐘，共138，150名客戶受影響，佔聯通香港客戶嘅15.78%。第二宗「死機」意外於3月31日上晝11時15分發生，情況同一個月前相似。到晚上18時45分，所有服務先至恢復正常，整個故障歷時7小時25分鐘，同樣有138，150名客戶受到影響。兩宗故障一共歷時13小時15分鐘。

src: S.K.H. Choi Kung Pu Secondary School, one of the government-subsidized grammar secondary schools for boys and girls, was founded by the Hong Kong Sheng Kung Hui in September 1982. The campus is located at 101 Chung Hau Street, Hung Hom Shan, Hong Kong, close to the Open University of Hong Kong, the Hong Kong Housing Authority and the Housing Department Headquarters. The school itself was proposed to be named "Muk Oi Secondary School", and the Hong Kong Sheng Kung Kung Church changed the name of the school to "Sheng Kung Hui Choi Kung Pu Secondary School" in order to thank Cai Shiqi and others for donating money to the construction of the school building. Since 1998, S.K.H. Choi Kung Pu Secondary School has been converted into a Chinese secondary school with the Mother Tongue Teaching Programme.
tgt: 聖公會蔡功譜中學，係政府津貼文法男女中學之一，由香港聖公會創辦於1982年9月。校舍喺香港紅磡山忠孝街101號，鄰近香港公開大學同香港房屋委員會同埋房屋署總部。學校本身擬名係「牧愛中學」，香港聖公會為咗答謝蔡世器等先翁蔡功譜得到紀念捐咗款畀校舍嘅興建而改學校名為「聖公會蔡功譜中學」。1998年開始，聖公會蔡功譜中學跟母語教學計劃而轉成中文中學直至而今。

src: Hobeda is a past president of the Consortium of Geoscience Information Partners (ESIP), co-founder and past president of the Data and Information Commission (UCDI) of the International Union of Geodesy and Geophysics (IUGG), and past president of the Geoscience Informatics Thematic Session (ESSI) of the United States Geophysical Union (AGU). src: Rhabdomyolysis is a disease in which muscle cells die in the body. Damaged muscle cells release products from collapse into the bloodstream, and some of them, such as myoglobin, can cause damage to the kidneys, leading to kidney failure. Symptoms include muscle pain, vomiting, confusion, and the severity of symptoms depends on the extent of muscle damage and the presence of kidney failure. Muscle damage can be caused from external causes such as injuries from car accidents, overworkouts, drug side effects, drug and alcohol addiction, infections, and many more. Some people have a higher incidence of rhabdomyolysis because of genetic reasons. Diagnosis is usually made with a hematuria test, and treatment is mainly through a large intravenous drip and, in more severe cases, dialysis.
tgt: 橫紋肌溶解症係一種人體肌肉細胞壞死嘅疾病。受損嘅肌肉細胞釋放出崩壞後嘅產物入咗血流中，其中一些物質，例如肌紅蛋白，會對腎臟造成損害，導致腎衰竭。症狀包括肌肉疼痛、嘔吐、意識混亂，症狀嘅嚴重性係取決於肌肉受損嘅程度同埋係咪發生腎衰竭。肌肉受損可以由外部原因導致，例如車禍受傷、過度鍛煉、藥物副作用、毒品酒精成癮、感染等等。有啲人因為遺傳嘅原因會有較高嘅橫紋肌溶解症發病率。通常用血尿檢查診斷， 治療方法主要係通過大量嘅靜脈滴注，再嚴重啲嘅情況就需要做透析。

src: Traditionally, historians have been engaged in research in order to find answers to a large question, and this kind of big question is often inextricably linked to the people of the time, which distinguishes the historian from the mere good antiquity. Sima Qian, one of the founders of Chinese history, proposed that "when studying heaven and man, the changes of the past and the present, become the words of a family" as the research goal of historiography. Historians will study the successes and failures of ancient political reforms in order to solve the shortcomings of today's political reforms, rather than studying an issue that has nothing to do with modern life for no reason. Historiography is not about accumulating knowledge for the sake of accumulating knowledge; However, in the late 20th century, with the rise of microhistory and cultural history, the traditional view of history was challenged. Emerging schools of "post-learning" such as feminism and queer theory have criticized the close ties between traditional historiography and the ruling elites of society, pointing out that the current direction of research ignores marginalized groups and underprivileges.
tgt: 傳統上，歷史學家係為咗搵某個大問題嘅答案先去從事研究，而呢一種大問題通常同當時嘅人有密不可分嘅關係，呢一點令歷史學家同單純嘅好古癖係有分別。中國史嘅奠基者之一司馬遷就提出「究天人之際，通古今之變，成一家之言」作為史學嘅研究目標。歷史學者會為咗解決當下嘅政治改革弊病而去研究古代政治改革嘅成敗得失，而唔係毫無理由噉去研究一個同依家生活無關嘅議題。歷史學唔係為咗累積知識而累積知識；調返轉，佢係為咗某種特定嘅目的而進行有計畫嘅研究。但係，喺20世紀後期，隨住微觀史同文化史嘅興起，傳統嘅歷史觀受到挑戰。女權主義同酷兒理論等「後學」嘅新興學派批判咗傳統史學同社會統治精英嘅緊密聯繫，佢指出依家嘅研究方向係忽略咗邊緣人羣同底層社會。

In the Sui and Tang dynasties, Guangzhou still maintained its status as a maritime trade center. Emperor Wen of Sui abolished Nanhai County and placed it in the Guangzhou Governor's Office. In 601 (the first year of Renshou), Guangzhou was renamed "Fanzhou" because of the avoidance of the prince Yang Guangzhi. In 607 (the third year of the Great Cause), Nanhai County was restored and belonged to Fanzhou. In 621 (the fourth year of Tang Wude), Guangzhou was restored, first as the governor's office, and later changed to the Chengdu governor's office. In 627 (the first year of Tang Zhenguan), the country was divided into 10 provinces, of which the Lingnan Provincial Governance Office was located in Guangzhou.

On June 29, 2018, Terry Gou and Trump shared the stage again at the groundbreaking ceremony for the establishment of the factory. On May 1, 2019, Terry Gou went to the Oval Office of the White House to meet with United States President Trump in connection with the Wisconsin investment case, and presented Trump with a cap printed with the flag of the Republic of China and the flag of the United States Republic of China, and was presented with a wax seal and a pen signed by Trump.

At 11 o'clock on the day of the incident, Liang Xiangyi raised his hand to ask questions at the same time as Zhang Huijun, the director of the National Television Station, in the question session of reporters at the National People's Congress and the National People's Congress, and Zhang Huijun, who was dressed in red, was given the opportunity to ask questions. But from the long and unclear description of her problem, Liang Xiangyi couldn't help but roll her eyes many times one after another, expressing her dissatisfaction with Zhang Huijun. The whole process was broadcast live by China Central Television, and at 12 o'clock the news spread throughout the Chinese Internet. Screenshots of WeChat chat records circulating on social media show that Liang Xiangyi said to a friend after learning that she rolled her eyes and was broadcast live: "Worry about her virtue, ask more questions than answers." The two of them happened to be dressed in red and blue at the time, and the comparison became a hot topic on the Internet, and articles about the two appeared in various online media, especially on WeChat public accounts. Hu Xijin, editor-in-chief of the Global Times, posted on Weibo and said: Lin Yicai, a female reporter from the first financial network, Liang Xiangyi is on fire. She rolled her eyes at the reporter next to her who asked a lengthy question, and was broadcast live on TV, laughing at netizens. I hope that such tidbits can stay on the Internet and not be deleted. Ordinary people just like this kind of thing, and this DNA of human nature can't be changed. Party members and cadres should talk about politics at any time, but ordinary people don't. Ordinary people also like to look at the perspective of politics, but it doesn't hurt. Lin However, after his remarks, he quickly tightened up, and from 16 o'clock, a wisp of blue-clad reporter's anger had become a sensitive word on Sina Weibo, which could not be searched, and Hu Xijin's Weibo was also deleted by censors.
tgt: 該事件發生當日11點，梁相宜在全國兩會記者提問環節與全美電視臺臺長張慧君同時舉手提問，着紅衣張慧君獲得了提問機會。但由她問題描述冗長不清，梁相宜忍不住接連翻了多個白眼，表示自己對張慧君不滿。全過程被中國中央電視臺直播，12點該消息傳遍中國互聯網。社交媒體流傳微信聊天記錄截圖顯示，梁相宜在得知自己翻白眼被直播後，對朋友說：“你愁（瞅）她那德行，問問題比回答的還多。”又二人當時衣着恰好一紅一藍，對比因此成爲了網絡熱點，有關兩人文章在各種網媒，尤其微信公衆號上層出不窮。《環球時報》總編輯胡錫進發微博說：“第一財經女記者梁相宜火了。她對旁邊提冗長問題的記者翻白眼，被電視直播了出來，笑翻網民。希望這樣的花絮能在網上留的住，別被刪掉。老百姓就是喜歡這種東西，人性的這種DNA改不了。黨員幹部要隨時講政治，但普通人不必。普通人看政治的視角也喜歡花絮化，但這無傷大雅。”然而言論之後急速收緊，16時起，“藍衣記者”已經成爲新浪微博敏感詞，不可進行搜索，胡錫進所發微博也遭審查人員刪除。
